name: Avenger's Legguards
tooltip:
Avenger's LegguardsLevel 60

Bring the Skin of the Great Sandworm, 2 Idols of Strife, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Kandrostrasz inside Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Skin of the Great Sandworm
- Idol of Strife x 2
- Ivory Scarab x 5
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
